title: One day in perfect health
creator_credit: John Krish and Data Film Productions
brief_description: The story of the London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine, showing the work being done in combating tropical diseases. The film refers to the School’s early history and some of the famous scientists associated with it. To this school, and its hospital, come doctors and students from many countries to learn and study at first hand diseases such as malaria, sleeping sickness, and leprosy. The film was made for the British Central Office of Information.
